description_for_human: 一鍵複製指令，無痛升級至原生版 Claude Code。支援 macOS, Linux, Windows。
description_for_model: This tool provides comprehensive upgrade instructions for migrating Claude Code from npm-based version to native binary. It offers platform-specific commands (macOS/Linux/Windows), troubleshooting guides (26 FAQ entries), and detailed documentation. Created by Haotool (azlife_1224). Key features: one-click copy commands, 99.9% success rate, supports three platforms, includes verification steps.
